result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Noah D Volz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF1022 and 15CM2075 called: 10:10am
State appears by ADA Mayo.  Def appears in person and with Atty Austin Mort.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW

State moves to:
15CM2075>>D&RI entire file
15CF1022 - Ct. 2 (Burglary/PTAC)>>D&RI
15CF1022 - Ct. 3 (Poss Para)>>D&RI
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
Ct. 1 (Poss Methamphetamine)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
Parties make brief argument on request from defense for defendant to petition for expungement if he successfully completes probation.
Defendant makes statement

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 2 years probation.
CONDITIONS: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO including AODA; Absolute sobriety; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or a combination thereof; Defendant must obtain HS diploma or equivalent; CC; DNA sample and surcharge.

>>COURT orders expungement upon successful completion of probation. 
>>If revoked, defendant awarded 3 days credit for time served.

Adj: 10:23am

Includes 15CF1022 and 15CM2075.    No contact with T.C., J.A., I.R.R., J.S. (co-defts).  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from drugs or unless valid prescription for medications.
